pullRequest.title: [KOGITO-3297] Bump CloudEvents api to 2.x
pullRequest.bodyText:
Fix https://issues.redhat.com/browse/KOGITO-3297
Signed-off-by: ruromero rromerom@redhat.com
Upgrade CloudEvents dependencyManagement to 2.0.0-milestone2 that was already being used by the event addon.
Refactor tracing addon to use the new version
Refactor event addon to simplify the use

afterCommit.message:
[KOGITO-3297] Bump CloudEvents api to 2.x

Signed-off-by: ruromero <rromerom@redhat.com>

nodes.bodyText: Can you please verify if this code works in native mode? As far as I remember this resource should be added to resources-config.json or similar to have it at runtime (also CloudEventsProvider could have similar problem to prevent class removal)
Can you please verify if this is needed? Do we use jandex in the tests (and only in the tests)?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -1 +1,4 @@
-quarkus.log.level=INFO
\ No newline at end of file
+quarkus.log.level=INFO
+
+quarkus.index-dependency.cloudevents.group-id=io.cloudevents
+quarkus.index-dependency.cloudevents.artifact-id=cloudevents-http-restful-ws

nodes.bodyText: I don't think we should "hide" a serialization exception in an empty result. What about propagate the exception?
What is this module used for?
